Translations.Text: O you who believe, shall I lead you to a trade that will save you from painful retribution
That you believe in God and His messenger and strive in the cause of God with your money and your lives. This is best for you, if only you knew
He will then forgive your sins, and admit you into paradises with rivers flowing beneath, and beautiful mansions in the gardens of Eden. This is the greatest triumph
And also you will receive what you love: a triumph from God and a victory that is close at hand. And give good news to the believers

O you who believe, be God's supporters, as Jesus the son of Mary said to his disciples: "Who are my supporters towards God" The disciples said: "We are God's supporters." Thus, a group from the Children of Israel believed, and another group rejected. So We supported those who believed against their enemy, and they were successful
